title: 335: CHATTY BROS: The Bros Get Blindfolded & Evan Throws Up
itunes:title: 335: CHATTY BROS: The Bros Get Blindfolded & Evan Throws Up
description:
It’s Chatty Bros Christmas Edition! Grayston and Evan toast with cider cocktails and chat childhood Christmases, believing in Santa, discuss “worst presents ever” from the #broadsquad, and in Bachelorette traditions of yore - they get blindfolded and feed each other Christmas treats. And of course they chat Michelle’s Fantasy Suites!

 

***Per usual, The Bros episode is more of a visual one! You can watch on Youtube here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzx2N1qxFObhvSvf9tp7ayQ 

 

FOLLOW THE BROS:

Grayston: https://www.instagram.com/pipyopi/

Evan: https://www.instagram.com/trippersounds/

Chatty Broads: https://www.instagram.com/chattybroads/

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***SQUARESPACE: Check out SQUARESPACE.COM/CHATTY for a free trial and use the code CHATTY to save 10% off your first purchase of a website or domain!

***FLEX: Go to FLEXFITS.COM/CHATTY and use code CHATTY for 20% off Flex Disc Starter Kits - or 10% off your first Flex Cup + free US shipping! 

***BLUELAND: Get 15% off your first order when you go to BLUELAND.COM/CHATTY

***EVERLYWELL: Get 20% off an at-home lab test at EVERLYWELL.COM/CHATTY

***CREDIT KARMA: Head to CREDITKARMA.COM/LOANOFFERS to see personalized offers with your approval odds right now!
